channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: America’s housing crisis is solvable—if we choose to build
item.description: The housing crisis is not a red or blue issue—it’s a purple issue affecting every community. There’s a win-win solution.
